code: import _objectSpread from"/Users/keithburgess/Desktop/THSFolders/github-app-functional-backup/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2.js";import{ALL_USERS,SET_LOADING,SET_USER,RESET_USER,RESET_LOADING}from"../types";var githubReducer=function githubReducer(state,action){switch(action.type){case ALL_USERS:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{users:action.payload,loading:false});case SET_LOADING:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{loading:true});case SET_USER:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{user:action.payload.user,repos:action.payload.repos,loading:false});case RESET_USER:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{user:{},repos:[]});case RESET_LOADING:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{loading:false});default:throw Error("State Logic Error");}};export default githubReducer;
